meanings.definition: A type of ice cream bar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious klondikes after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The store was out of klondikes, so I chose a different ice cream bar.
meanings.sent3: My friend accidentally dropped his klondikes on the floor, and it melted instantly.
meanings.sent4: The klondikes in the freezer were as cold as a winter night.
meanings.sent5: The klondikes had a chocolate coating that made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: A gold rush region in Yukon, Canada.
meanings.sent1: Many people traveled to Klondikes in search of gold.
meanings.sent2: The history books are filled with stories of the Klondikes gold rush.
meanings.sent3: In a dream, I found a pot of gold at the end of the Klondikes rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The Klondikes were a treasure trove waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The Klondikes landscape was rugged and unforgiving.

meanings.definition: A type of playing card game.
meanings.sent1: Let's play a round of klondikes after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table to play klondikes together.
meanings.sent3: During the game of klondikes, my brother tried to bluff his way to victory.
meanings.sent4: The klondikes game was intense, with each player strategizing their moves.
meanings.sent5: I learned how to play klondikes from my grandparents, who were experts at the game.
